title: 【坑搬】[Business HQ] —— [水表之家]
author: 孤独秋叶
txt_content:
本帖最后由 孤独秋叶 于 2016-1-28 19:42 编辑 

[业务总部]
图片介绍








文字介绍
作者原话Here is a Business HQ/Office that I've built over the past two nights in Attack of The B Team, a modpack in the Technic Launcher. I have not fully furnished it as my interior design is rather poor, so please decorate it yourself and change any interior features you do not like.   The Building has:  5 levels of office space  A reception/library on the ground floor  A staff common room on the third floor  A rooftop 'garden'  Open Blocks elevators connecting each of the floors     Ensure you only use this in the Attack of The B Team modpack. It will NOT work in Vanilla Minecraft 
介绍

这是一个商业办公楼，至于楼是作者建了很久建好的，内饰需要自己去完善它，
感觉他可以用来做服务器主城~至少我是这么认为的
但是觉得如果楼做的多一些就更加完美了~



原地址 [ 原地址点我 ]
下载地 [ 百度云 ]

replies.txt_content:
darrksy 发表于 2016-1-6 23:24
然而并不特别好看啊
其实我觉得还是很不错的，就是周围的环境和他不协调。

replies.author: 像素君
replies.txt_content: 看起来只是高了些而已~
